    async def do_publish(self):
        """
        发布任务，如果获取登录状态失败，则重试
        """
        try:
            async for attempt in AsyncRetrying(
                    stop=stop_after_attempt(
                        LoginLocator.login_chk_retry_cnt),
                    wait=wait_fixed(LoginLocator.login_chk_interval),
                    retry=retry_if_exception_type(PlwTimeoutError),
                    before_sleep=before_sleep_log(self._logger, logging.WARNING)):
                with attempt:
                    async with async_playwright() as playwright:
                        await self.publish_mission(playwright)
        except Exception as ex:
            self._logger.exception('❌❌❌《%s》发布异常: %s',
                                   self._publish_title, ex)

    async def publish_mission(self, playwright: Playwright):
        """
        发布任务
        """
        self._logger.info("=" * 60)
        self._logger.info('[%s] 开始执行发布任务', self.__class__.__name__)

        # 浏览器上下文
        browser, context, page = await PlaywrightCommon(
            cookie_filepath=self._cookie_filepath,
            headless=self._headless).launch_browser(playwright)
        try:
            # 判断登录状态
            await self._check_login_status(page)
    
            # 上传发布内容
            await self.upload(page)
    
            # 填写信息
            await self.fill_publish_content(page)
    
            # 触发发布并检查是否发布成功
            await self.publish_trigger(page)
        except Exception as ex:
            self._logger.exception('❌❌❌《%s》发布异常: %s',
                                   self._publish_title, ex)
